A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am reposting my review after hearing 1/2 stars don't count and I want my voice heard. I was wondering how it could still be at 49% when almost every review is 1/2 star.

From a fan of 40 years\, this film was a travesty on so many levels. My biggest problem is making Luke a wuss. This same guy rushed off to the cloud city to fight Darth Vader and save his friends not even being a Jedi Knight but now that he's a master Jedi\, he is a wuss and won't fight for anyone. He just wants to die. OMG!!!!

A fan for 40 years and this chump of a director killed Star Wars for me in 2 1/2 hours. If I ever see him in person\, I'm going to punch him it the mouth!!!
